WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks.  Yep, looks like https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/995 .  Closing as a duplicate.
WorkItem.Description:
I'm trying to create documentation using JSDoc with a Typescript based project. When I turned on "Keep Comments" in the options, I started seeing server errors such as:

```
Server Error in '/<myapp>' Application.

Reference error in "~/areas/<somepath>/SomeClass.js", line 6. Cannot find "~/App/Classes/SomeOtherClass.ts".
```

I noticed the '///<reference path="...">' directives are now being copied over (as they are legitimate comments in JS), and the IIS (8?) compiler is picking them up.
WorkItem.Summary: With "Keep Comments" enabled, <reference ...> to *.d.ts causes server error

Comments.Message:
I just realized this was a duplicate of this:
[https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/995](https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/995)
